To : Chartering Department

From : Regency Shipping Pte Ltd

Email : chartering@regency-shipping.com

 

Dear Sirs,

 

Please assist to propose suitable biz for our open tonnages as following :

 

VESSEL’S OPEN :

Vessel Name

DWT / Built

Open Port

Gear

Remark

Prefer

W Huang Pu

34,038 / 2010

Mumbai, India

24-30 Aug

2 X 40 + 2 X 35

Combine 60-70mt

S.E.Asia – Japan Range


 KATHY OCEAN 
52,428 / 2003

-

-

4 X 30 + Grabber

S.Africa – Japan Range

 

VESSEL’S DETAILS :

 

1.

M.V. W HUANG PU 

- Multi-purpose vessel with retractable Tween decks allowing vessel to operate as a Single decker

- 2/3/4 holds box shape, semi open hatch

- 2X25mt coils ok, Dangerous cargo certs fitted

 

MPP TWEEN DECKER , BLT 2010 CHINA , TPC 47.20

PANAMA FLAG , LR CLASS   5H/5H  

34,038MT DWT , DRAFT 10.916M
GRT/NRT : 22,998 / 12,317  LOA 182.86M / BM : 28.39 M

1 SET X 35 MT (SINGLE)

ADA WOG

ADA

M.V. KATHY OCEAN (EX. MARYLISA V)

SPEED/ CONSUMPTION:

AT SEA

BALLAST: ABT 13KTS / ABT 20.5MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)

LADEN: ABT 13KTS / ABT 22.0MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)

 

ALL DETAILS ARE ABOUT AND ABOUT IS DEFINED AS -0.5 KNOT ON THE SPEED AND +5% ON THE CONSUMPTION FIGURES.

 

ECO SPEED / CONSUMPTION: WOG

BALLAST: ABT 12KTS / ABT 19.5MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)

LADEN: ABT 12KTS / ABT 20.5MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)

 

(ABOVE ECO IS ALWAYS SUBJECT TO VESSEL PERIODICALLY DURING SHORT INTERVALS, OF ABOUT

2-3 HOURS EVERY 2 DAYS OR AS REQUIRED, INCREASE RPM IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN THE SMOOTH RUNNING OF THE MAIN ENGINE)

 

IN PORT

IDLE: ABT LSFO 2.0 MT + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER USE)

WORKING: ABT LSFO 4.0 MT + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER USE)

GRABS WORKING: ABT ADDITIONAL LSIFO 1.5 MT.

ADA
